name: Ecommerce Hot Sauce
description: Ecommerce store built with Vue, Nuxt, Firebase, Contentful CMS and Stripe.
note: Also deployed this as a static site to AWS with S3, API Gateway and Lambda.

name: Grafana Loki Logging w/Python
description: A medium article project that demonstrates logging from a Python application to Loki using Docker Compose. It includes services for Loki, Grafana, Minio, and a custom Python log generator.

name: ELK Stack on AWS
description: A medium article project that demonstrates setting up an ELK stack on AWS using Ubuntu VMs. It includes services for Elasticsearch, Kibana, Logstash.
